items.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
items.description: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite rose on Wednesday, as shares of Apple popped 5%. Here's what's on CNBC's radar heading into Thursday.

items.title: A look at the gold charts and whether the precious metal can add to its record-setting gains
items.description: Chart analyst Frank Cappelleri breaks down what's going on with gold, and what's next for the precious metal.

items.title: Apple becomes latest company to offer cash olive branch to Trump. How do you invest around this?
items.description: Investor Tim Seymour talks about the Apple-Trump deal and other trade headlines.

items.title: Eli Lilly earnings are coming Thursday. Here's what top analysts expect
items.description: Wall Street is optimistic heading into Eli Lilly's second-quarter earnings report.

items.title: Morgan Stanley's picks to surprise on earnings rest of the reporting season
